name: Bloxy Puzzles
description:
Bloxy has 30 fantastic mobile puzzle games to unlock, all take seconds to learn, but a lifetime to master"

Simply build columns and rows by dragging and dropping the puzzle pieces onto the grid. Build your score and compete against your friends.

30 puzzle games to unlock, these great games include Shapes, Borders, Hexagons, Bombs and Timed.

Start on Easy and work your way to the Wizard.

Use hammers to clear spaces or Bins to replace puzzle pieces.

Bloxy offers years of free game play, keep playing feature and no time limit.

Addictive, fun and easy to play, Bloxy is a great mobile game to play in bed, on the train, just about anywhere!"
